revision.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Curaçá |settlement_type = Municipality |official_name = The Municipality of Curaçá |image_skyline= |imagesize= 250px |image_caption= |motto= |image_flag = Bandeira De Curaçá.jpg |image_seal = Brasão de Curaçá 2.png |image_map = Bahia_Municip_Curaca.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Localization of the city |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Regions of Brazil|Region]] |subdivision_type2 = [[States of Brazil|State]] |subdivision_name = [[Brazil]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Northeast Region, Brazil|Northeast]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Bahia state|Bahia]] |established_title = Founded |established_date = July 6, 1832 |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Pedro Oliveira (2016-2020) |area_note = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 6442.190 |population_note = [http://www.ibge.gov.br/home/estatistica/populacao/estimativa2008/POP2008_DOU.pdf IBGE 2008 statistics] |population_as_of = 2010 |population_metro = |area_metro_km2 = |population_total = 32165 |population_density_km2 = 4.9 |timezone = [[UTC-3]] |utc_offset = -3 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = {{coord|08|59|31|S|39|54|28|W|region:BR|display=inline,title}} |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |blank_name = '''[[Human Development Index|HDI]]''' (2010) |blank_info = 0.700 – high[http://www.pnud.org.br/atlas/ranking/Ranking-IDHM-Municipios-2010.aspx] [[UNDP]] |website = [http://www.curaca.ba.gov.br/ www.curaca.ba.gov.br] |footnotes = }} '''Curaçá''' is the northernmost city in the [[Brazil]]ian [[states of Brazil|state]] of [[Bahia]]. The municipality was designated a priority area for conservation and sustainable use when the [[Caatinga Ecological Corridor]] was created in 2006.{{citation|language=pt |last=Mattos|first=Marluza|title=Ministério cria Corredor Ecológico da Caatinga|year=2006|publisher=Ministério do Meio Ambiente |url=http://www.mma.gov.br/informma/item/3274-ministerio-cria-corredor-ecologico-da-caatinga|accessdate=2016-11-01}} == References == {{Reflist}} {{Municipalities of Bahia}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Curaca}} [[Category:Municipalities in Bahia]] [[Category:Populated places established in 1832]] [[Category:1832 establishments in Brazil]] {{Bahia-geo-stub}}
